<nsimmons®lunflaw.com>, '

"mcohen@CohenGressencom" 
<mcohen®cohengressencotn>, Laura Menninger 
<Imenninger@hmtlaw.corn> 
Subject: RE: Letter regarding discovery attached. 
Date: Wed, 12 Aug 2020 20:51:58 +0000 
Attachments: 2020-08-12 _letter 
to_GM_counsel_re_discovery.pdf 
Jeff, 
Attached please find the Government's response to your August 9, 2020 letter. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
1 St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
From: Jeff Pagliuca ipagliuca@hmflawcom> 
Sent: Tuesday, August 11, 202011:45 PM 
To: 
) `c.> 
Cc: 
I •td 
>; Nicole Simmons <nsimmons@hmflaw.com>; 
<>; CEverdell@CohenGresser.com; mcohen@CohenGresser.com; Laura Menninger 
<Imenninger@hmflaw.com> 
Subject: Re: Letter regarding discovery attached. 
I'm not sure I can wait for a decision until Thursday. I will discuss with my colleagues and attempt to confer with the 
Government by phone tomorrow. Absent any additional information from the government you are not leaving me with 
any realistic options and I will probably need to simply advise Judge Nathan that the government's position is forthcoming 
but because we learned about the information on Friday and the Circuit's tight schedule we could not wait any longer. 
A phone call tomorrow would be appreciated. 
Jeff 
EFTA00021898

On Aug 11, 2020, at 9:07 PM, 
Jeff, 
wrote: 
We are still considering your request, and we will reach out when we are prepared to provide you with our response, 
which will be no later than Thursday, August 13th. 
Best, 
From: Jeff Pagliuca 
<jpagliuca@hmflaw.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 11, 2020 7:28 PM 
To: 
Cc: >; Nicole Simmons 
<nsimmons@hmflaw.com>•
>; CEverdell@CohenGressercom•
 
mcohen@CohenGresser.com•
 Laura Menninger 
<Imenninger@hmflaw.com>
Subject: Re: Letter regarding discovery attached. 
Looks like our email is back up. As indicated in the gmail email I would like to discuss your position by phone tomorrow. I 
am available any time. 
Jeff 
On Aug 11, 2020, at 12:19 PM, wrote: 
Good afternoon, 
We will provide you with our response by this Thursday, August 13th. We will, of course, send the response sooner if 
we are able. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
l  St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, NY 10007 
From: 
Sent: Monday, August 10, 2020 5:28 PM 
To: Nicole Simmons 
<nsimmons@hmflaw.com>• 
I
sc›; 
) 
>• CEverdell@CohenGressercom• mcohen@CohenGresser.com

Subject: RE: Letter regarding discovery attached. 
Good afternoon, 
We are in receipt of the email and letter. We will respond as soon as we are able. 
Regards, 
Alex. 
Assistant U.S. Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
212.637.2415 
From: Nicole Simmons 
<nsimmons@hmflaw.com>
Sent: Monday, August 10, 2020 16:18 
To:

Subject: FW: Letter regarding discovery attached. 
Dear Counsel, 
>; 
At the request of Jeffrey Pagliuca please see the attached letter. Our firm is currently experiencing technical issues with 
our email system. If you would please kindly confirm receipt of this email and the attachment it would be greatly 
appreciated. 
Thank you, 
Nicole 
From: Jeff Pagliuca 
<jpagliuca@hmflaw.com>
Sent: Sunday, August 09, 2020 4:56 PM 
To:

<Ienninger@hmflaw.com>•

Subject: Letter regarding discovery attached. 
Dear Counsel, 
Please see attached conferral letter. 
Jeff

Jeffrey S. Pagliuca 
Haddon, Morgan and Foreman, P.C.

Denver, Colorado 80203

mation that is confidential or legally privileged. If you are not the intended recipient, or a person responsible for 
delivering it to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that you must not read this transmission and that any disclosure, 
copying, printing, distribution or use of any of the information contained in or attached to this transmission is STRICTLY 
PROHIBITED. If you have received this transmission in error, please notify the sender by telephone or return e-mail and delete the 
original transmission and its attachments without reading or saving it in any manner. Thank you 
EFTA00021901
